response.overview: Brandon has some problems. His grandmother hates him, his only friend is even more of a loser than him, and he needs a job. Desperate for work Brandon reluctantly gets a job as a pizza delivery job. Trying to prove his worth he reluctantly agrees to make a delivery to a neighborhood from which no one has returned. He finds that the house he's assigned to is full of sorority girls but what seems like a porno turns out into a horror show when he discovers they brought a nerdy guy over... and eat him. Fearing for his life Brandon decides to simply hide and hope to make it to the morning. But when the girl of his dreams enters the house Brandon must face his fears and literally fight for his job.
response.tagline: Tonight, pizza guy is on the menu.
response.title: Delivery
